thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Bill Dendes
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Bill Dendes

author: Bill Dendes
title: Bill Dendes
text: The Japan Rail Pass was very quick to apply for and receive. If you're travelling to different cities, you will definitely get your money's worth. It doesn't get you absolutely everywhere but a JR station is usually very close to wherever you have to go anyway. Highly Recommended!
